content.query:
select *
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'

) with(
jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as payment_type

-- step2

select JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') payment_type,
       JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc') payment_type_desc
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'

) with(
jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as payment_type


-- step3

select CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
       CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'

) with(
jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as payment_type

-- step 4 OpenJSON function

select *
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'

) with(
jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as payment_type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc);


-- step 5 OpenJSON function with Clause

select *
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'

) with(
jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as payment_type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20)
)


-- step 6
select payment_type, payment_type_desc
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'

) with(
jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as payment_type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20)
)


--step 7
select payment_type, description
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'

) with(
jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as payment_type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    description VARCHAR(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
)


--- Reading data from JSON with arrays
select CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
       CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc_0,
       CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc[1].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc_1
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/payment_type_array.json',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'

) with(
jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as payment_type


-- use openjson to explode the array
select payment_type, sub_type, value
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/payment_type_array.json',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'

) with(
jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as payment_type
CROSS APPLY Openjson(jsonDoc)
with(
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) as Json
)
CROSS APPLY OpenJson(payment_type_desc)
with(
    sub_type SMALLINT,
    value VARCHAR(20)
)
